body.name: WELOV Mini Air Purifier for Bedroom, HEPA Small Air Purifier with Aromatherapy for Pet Hair, Odors, Pollen, Smoke, Portable Air Cleaner with Sleep Mode Speed Control Timer for Home Office Living Room
deliveryMessages: Or fastest delivery Tomorrow, February 17. Order within 38 mins
Or fastest pickup Tomorrow, February 17. Order within 10 hrs 23 mins
features: 【High Circulation Rate】Get Clean, Fresh Air in Minutes! Our air purifier refreshes the air per hour in rooms up to 315 ft²/30 m², covering every corner of the room to promote better health for you. One is enough to effectively improve your indoor air quality. The small portable air purifier is easy to place anywhere you want. HEPA air purifier is perfect for bedrooms, dorms, apartments, medium rooms, small rooms, offices, desks, desktops, living rooms, kitchens and bookrooms.

【Preset Custom Mode】Our HEPA air purifier is designed with adjustable 4-timing and 3-speed settings. You can flexibly set usage time to 2/4/6/8 hours and choose 1/2/3 fan gear to meet your needs: Low, Medium, or High.

【Ultra-Quiet & Sleep Mode】Welov air purifier operates quietly, especially when the sleep mode is activated, sound is as low as 23dB, which will not wake up or disturb the sleep of you and your family, including your pets. Making it ideal for creating a peaceful and relaxing indoor environment while still providing effective purification.

【Filter Replacement Reminder】To ensure the health and safety of you and your family, our air purifier is equipped with a cartridge replacement reminder. Smart filter indicator light will auto-on when it’s time for a replacement. For optimal performance, we recommend replacing the filter cartridge once every 3-6 months. You can buy new filters by searching for B0C5C2G4J3 or Welov P100 Mini Replacement Filter. No need for specialist knowledge, easy to replace in a few minutes!

【Best After-Sales Service】All the Welov Air Purifiers meet California's most stringent safety standards: CARB Certified, CA65, EPA, ETL and ENERGY STAR Certified. If there are any questions, you can contact us anytime. We will have a professional customer service team to communicate with you! Please remove the plastic bag from the H13 HEPA filter before running the air purifier.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 28, 2023
reviews.reviewText: I find myself checking on this air purifier every now and then just to be sure it's actually turned on, that's how quiet it is! It's obviously working, since after several months of use, I cleaned out SO MUCH dust from the filter! Seeing how dirty that was makes me never want to be without this. I think it's attractive as far as an air purifier goes, it doesn't really take away anything from my bedroom decor, but just kind of blends in.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on June 29, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars a good little (with an emphasis on *little*) air purifier
reviews.reviewText: I've got pretty bad environmental allergies (pollen, mold, dust, you name it...), and I've found that having an air purifier running in the bedroom at night can make all of the difference in how I feel for the rest of the day. The air purifier that I've had for the last several years isn't great (it's huge, and loud), so I decided to give this one a try.First off, I have to say that this air purifier is considerably smaller than I expected. Yeah, I get that it says "mini," but I didn't expect it to be quite so mini. Of course if I'd read the size on the page I'd have had a better idea, but I didn't do that, I judged by the pictures. Particularly the one with the dog, that looks like a samoyed. These aren't generally small dogs, which would seem to indicate that the air filter sitting beside it is larger than it actually is. Either that's a very small samoyed or, well, someone used Photoshop and didn't worry about proportions. (EDIT: They seem to have removed the picture with the dog that I was referencing here. So there's that.)But anyway, maybe you want a particularly small air purifier, so that's not necessarily a bad thing. My biggest problem with it is that it doesn't say anywhere here on Amazon, or on the packaging, what size room it's rated for. The room that I'm using it in is fairly small, so I can hope that it's adequate, but it would be nice to actually know.All that said, I set it up in that room a few hours ago, and I do feel like I notice a difference in the air quality when I walk in there now. It does seem to be having at least some effect. Maybe not as much as my old larger (too large for the room, really) purifier, but at least it's not doing nothing.The air filter has four speed settings, labeled sleep (actually, a moon icon),1, 2, and 3. I can't honestly tell a big difference between sleep mode and mode 1, other than that it turns any lights on the unit off when it's in sleep mode, so they may or may not be the same. On that speed it's so quiet that you can't even hear it unless you get right up next to it. But air movement is also very minimal, so I'm not convinced it's really very effective. Mode 2 is a bit louder, but still tolerable. Mode 3 is louder still, but even it isn't as loud as my old purifier on its lower settings.One thing that concerns me is that as of this writing, I have no idea where I'd go to purchase a replacement filter. The company offers filters for several of its other models for sale, but I can't find filters for this one on Amazon or on the company's own site. It's a little bothersome. Hopefully they'll rectify that soon enough, but I honestly might be hesitant to purchase until they do.But, assuming they do eventually make the filters available -- if you've got a small room that you want to filter the air in, this is probably a good choice. If you have any doubts about the size of the room, though, you may want to go with something a bit larger. Hopefully the company updates their listings to say more about what to expect.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 23, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Works like a charm
reviews.reviewText: I have cats and rats and snakes and guinea pigs and all sorts of other roommates, none of whom grace my home with the smell of daisies on an early summer morning. So I have a vast, and very helpful, selection of air purifiers.Like the rooms and nooks and crannies in my houses, the air purifiers come in every size imaginable. This one is small, not intended for multiple rooms. I do not even recommend it for the 315 square feet the product page says it will cover, at least if you have the type of odor issues that I do. However, for an average sized bedroom, say 12 feet by 16 feet, it works like a charm. Definitely a good choice.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 17, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars low power consumption, ultra portable
reviews.reviewText: This is a great air purifier, very portable and low power consuption.To start the filter is well made and is the star of the product, with HEPA filtration grade is good to filter most particles.One of the best features is that this filter is powered by USB, the purifier comes with a wall adapter, but it can be plugged to any USB port, this allows for portability and the ability to place it next to any USB port. It's great cause I have the purifier powered by my Wireless router, which is low voltage and therefore saves power.Its also very silent in the lowest settings, Since I have it pluged to my wireless router usb port it does not run on full power and that is quite alright, it still runs smoothly an quiet.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 26, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Perfect for 3d printer or soldering!
reviews.reviewText: I've really only used this for 2 things, soldering and 3d printing (PLA and PETG). It is small and compact, and not really loud, but when I'm using it soldering I see it suck the smoke up quickly and the room doesn't smell like I've been using solder. Obviously no smoke when 3d printing, but absolutely no smell at all. Game changer for soldering and 100% recommend this!!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 1, 2023
reviews.reviewText: Works well enough for helping dispel pet odors.
